blog.title: The source of Anime & Manga quotes
blog.name: allanimemangaquotes
blog.description:
Caution: There may be spoilers
We are SFW~
The images used in this tumblr blog is copyrighted to its respective owners/companies. We do not claim any property rights to the images displayed on this blog.
WE STRICTLY DO NOT USE FAN ART IMAGES

Remember to link/credit back to us whenever you post our quotures elsewhere!


 Otaku's Lurking


Please do not send your requests at our Twitter or Facebook for now. Send it here instead.

ATTENTION: REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN

When you REQUEST/ASK, Remember to include...
Name of Series:
Name of Character:
Quote:
Link of Image: (Screencap or Mangacap)
Here is an example on how to put in links in the request, you can put it in via this method. http(:)//www(.)website(.)com/ Thanks to those whom have pointed this out to us!

email: allanimemangaquotes@gmail.com

SEMI-HIATUS
This blog was created on the 8th May 2011
